member.name: T:TicketClassLibrary.Car
member.summary: A representation of cars needing to be ticketed.

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Car.Licenseplate
member.summary: The unique license plate, used for identifying the vehicle

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Car.Date
member.summary: The date at which the vehicle has crossed, given as a DateTime object.

member.name: P:TicketClassLibrary.Car.Brobizz
member.summary: Specifies whether Brobizz was used, and consequently, if a discount should be applied

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Car.Price
member.summary: Calculates the price for this vehicle's crossing.

member.name: M:TicketClassLibrary.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of vehicle, for categorization
member.returns: A string signifying the type of vehicle

member.summary: Specifies whether Brobizz was used, and consequently, if a discount should be applied

member.name: T:TicketClassLibrary.Vehicle
member.summary: The base class for all vehicles. Keep in mind, this is abstract and must be inherited.

member.summary: Specifies whether Brobizz was used, and consequently, if a discount should be applied
